summary: App to calculate horsepower based on vehicle weight and trap speed.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal drag-racing themed app logo/icon, flat vector style, transparent background (trap-hp-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Subtle dark asphalt/drag-strip background texture, wide, low-contrast (dragstrip-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page horsepower calculator that computes estimated horsepower from vehicle weight and quarter-mile trap speed, using a clearly displayed formula and units.
Add input validation and user guidance for the calculator fields.
Implement the horsepower calculation in the Motoko backend as a query method and have the frontend call it to compute the result.
Add a lightweight results panel that explains the output and includes a reset action.
Apply a coherent visual theme suitable for a motorsport/drag-racing calculator and enforce it consistently across layout, typography, and components.
Add generated static images for branding/background and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an app that calculates horsepower from weight and trap speed.
